title: Redesign login interface to match uploaded design mockup

requirements.text: Update the LoginPage component to match the uploaded design mockup with centered card layout, 'Welcome Back' heading, 'Sign in to your Salad Khatora account' subtitle, email and password input fields with icons, green 'Sign In' button, 'Don't have an account? Sign up' link, and 'Back to Home' link at the bottom
acceptanceCriteria: Login page displays 'Welcome Back' as the main heading in dark green color
Subtitle reads 'Sign in to your Salad Khatora account' in gray text
Email input field has an envelope icon and placeholder 'you@example.com'
Password input field has a lock icon and placeholder 'Enter your password'
Sign In button is styled with green background (#4ade80 or similar) and white text
Footer includes 'Don't have an account? Sign up' with 'Sign up' in green color
Footer includes 'Back to Home' link below the sign up text
Layout is centered on the page with white card background and rounded corners
Design maintains consistency with the uploaded image-1.png mockup

requirements.text: Continue using Internet Identity authentication for the actual login functionality while styling the interface to match the traditional email/password design shown in the mockup
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the 'Sign In' button triggers Internet Identity authentication flow
Email and password fields are visual elements only (non-functional inputs for design consistency)
Authentication continues to use the existing useInternetIdentity hook
User is redirected to dashboard after successful Internet Identity authentication
No backend changes are required for authentication logic

constraints: Must maintain Internet Identity authentication system - do not implement traditional username/password authentication
Do not modify backend authentication logic
Design must be responsive and mobile-friendly
